summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 32, Pontius' 2nd Addition, Supplemental, being the alley between Melrose Avenue North and Bellevue Avenue North, from East Republican Street to East Mercer Street, in accordance with Majority Petition No. 85150, creating a local improvement district therefor, providing the mode of payment therefor, and repealing Ordinance No. 44221.
